meanings.sent1: She auditioned for the school play.
meanings.sent2: He auditioned for the choir solo.
meanings.sent3: The cat auditioned for the role of a mouse in the play.
meanings.sent4: Her voice auditioned against the wind, reaching every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The bright stage lights made her nervous as she auditioned for the lead role.

meanings.definition: To try out for a role or position by performing in an audition.
meanings.sent1: They auditioned for the dance team last week.
meanings.sent2: She auditioned for the job of a lifetime.
meanings.sent3: The dog auditioned for the role of a guard in the movie.
meanings.sent4: His determination auditioned louder than his words.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her laughter auditioned for happiness in the room.
